title: End of the Harvest (Christian Movie)
description:
End of the Harvest (Christian Movie)


In this hard hitting inspiring prophecy drama, a college student discovers the shocking truth that the 6 days of creation could be a picture of how the course of life on earth would run leading up to the return of Christ. This film features a compelling gospel presentation and the answers to eternal life. Guaranteed you'll watch this more than once.

Runtime: 53 mins
Language: English (No-Subtitles)
Year: 1998
My Rating: 10/10
Quality: 7/10 

I would ask every Christian to do 2 things.

1. If possible please buy this movie. Do you know that there are 2.2 billion Christians on earth today. But only a privileged few, around 12% have the means and the accessibility to buy Christian films. Many Christians are too poor to buy movies or live in places where Christian films are not available. That's not all. 
Out of the 12% who have the means and accessibility to buy Christian media, only around 0.5% ever buys a Christian movie. In other words only 1 out of 200 Christians ever buys a Christian movie. 

2. Please seed the movies. If possible make copies and distribute to your poor neighbors especially during this Christmas. And please do pray for the movie makers and their families.

Remember the Kingdom of Heaven is in you and so is the choice of Heaven/Hell.

"Don't ask me what Christ can do for you! He has done all he could. Tell me what you can do for Christ?"

Uploaded by Indian Christian
